greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest prime factor of 11^n+1 (A034524).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..301 (terms 0..80 from Harry J. Smith)
program: (PARI) { for (n=0, 80, f=factor(11^n + 1)~; write("b062308.txt", n, " ", f[1, length(f)]) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009
xref: Cf. similar sequences listed in A274903.
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jul 12 2001
